verses.plain: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: because his mercy endureth for ever.
Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: Let Israel now say, that his mercy

verses.plain: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.

tokens.t: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy

verses.plain: Let them now that fear the LORD say, that his mercy endureth for ever.

verses.plain: I called upon the LORD in distress: the LORD answered me, and set me in a large place.
The LORD is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?

tokens.t: on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?

verses.plain: The LORD taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me.

tokens.t: taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see

verses.plain: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man.

tokens.t: than to put confidence in man.

verses.plain: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes.

tokens.t: than to put confidence in princes.

verses.plain: All nations compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD will I destroy them.

tokens.t: All nations compassed me about: but in the name of the

verses.plain: They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.

tokens.t: They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the

verses.plain: They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.

tokens.t: They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the

verses.plain: Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: but the LORD helped me.

tokens.t: Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: but the

verses.plain: The LORD is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.

tokens.t: my strength and song, and is become my salvation.

verses.plain: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.

in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the

verses.plain: The right hand of the LORD is exalted: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.

verses.plain: I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the LORD.

tokens.t: I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the

verses.plain: The LORD hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.

tokens.t: hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.

verses.plain: Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, and I will praise the LORD:

tokens.t: Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them,

verses.plain: This gate of the LORD, into which the righteous shall enter.

tokens.t: , into which the righteous shall enter.

verses.plain: I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.

tokens.t: I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.

verses.plain: The stone which the builders refused is become the head stone of the corner.

verses.plain: This is the LORD’s doing; it is marvellous in our eyes.
This is the day which the LORD hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.

tokens.t: hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.

verses.plain: Save now, I beseech thee, O LORD: O LORD, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.

tokens.t: Save now, I beseech thee, O
, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.

verses.plain: Blessed be he that cometh in the name of the LORD: we have blessed you out of the house of the LORD.

verses.plain: God is the LORD, which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords, even unto the horns of the altar.

tokens.t: , which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords,
unto the horns of the altar.

verses.plain: Thou art my God, and I will praise thee: thou art my God, I will exalt thee.

tokens.t: my God, and I will praise thee:
my God, I will exalt thee.

verses.plain: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
